subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|籍貫|外籍|圖籍|官籍|冥籍|古籍|復籍|冒籍|墳籍|史籍|唱籍|六籍|客籍軍|凌籍|多重國籍|典籍|客籍|出籍|尺籍|人言籍籍|回籍|學籍卡|寄籍|國籍|學籍|冊籍|名聲籍甚|地籍圖|學籍簿|口籍|外籍球員|入籍|名籍|外籍勞工|原籍|固有國籍|國籍法|帳籍|地籍|仙籍|二重國籍|祕籍|旗籍|祿籍|民籍|承籍|樂籍|戶籍謄本|牒籍|本籍|祖籍|歸籍|戶籍行政|戶籍法|會籍|戶籍登記|稅籍|狼籍|抄籍|無籍|文籍|書籍|省籍|杯盤狼籍|法籍|無籍之徒|桂籍|戶籍|版籍|籍田|籍記|經籍|聲稱籍甚|除籍|脫籍|籍籍無名|籍帳|籍籍|膠片書籍|黨籍|設籍|軍籍|船籍|經籍纂詁|黨籍碑|籍沒|雙重國籍|門籍|落籍|簿籍|篇籍|跆籍|通籍|籍甚|計籍|載籍|舉籍|紛紛籍籍}}

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text:
{{der-top|Compounds}}
Compounds starting with 籍:
* {{ja-r|籍%甚|せき%じん}}: an [[extremely]] [[favorable]] [[reputation]], [[high]] [[renown]], [[great]] [[fame]]
* {{ja-r|籍帳|へのふだ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|戸籍|へのふだ|rom=-}}, {{ja-r|戸札|へのふだ}}: a [[family]] [[register]] in ancient Japan
* {{ja-r|籍%田|せき%でん}}: a [[ceremony]] in ancient China where the [[emperor]] would make an [[offering]] to his [[ancestor]]s using [[grain]] the emperor had [[cultivate]]d himself; the [[field]] or [[paddy]] used for such [[cultivation]]; a similar ceremony [[conduct]]ed in ancient Japan by various [[lord]]s to [[encourage]] [[agriculture]]
* {{ja-r|籍%没|せき%ぼつ}}: [[confiscation]] by the [[government]] of a [[criminal]]'s [[asset]]s
{{der-mid}}
Compounds ending with 籍:
* {{ja-r|医%籍|い%せき}}: a [[doctor]]'s [[official]] [[license]]
* {{ja-r|移%籍|い%せき}}: a [[transfer]] of one's [[official]] [[residence]] or [[household]]; a [[transfer]] of [[membership]] to a different group
* {{ja-r|学%籍|がく%せき}}: a [[matriculation]] [[register]]
* {{ja-r|貫%籍|かん%せき}}, {{ja-r|貫%籍|かん%じゃく}}: one's [[original]] [[family]] [[register]] (such as when [[transfer]]ring); one's [[main]] family register; the [[location]] of one's family register
* {{ja-r|漢%籍|かん%せき}}, {{ja-r|漢%籍|から%ぶみ}}: a [[Chinese]] [[book]]; the Chinese [[classic]]s
* {{ja-r|艦%籍|かん%せき}}: a [[ship]]'s [[registration]], a ship's [[nationality]]
* {{ja-r|帰%籍|き%せき}}: to [[return]] one's original [[family]] [[register]] (such as after a [[divorce]] or the [[death]] of a [[spouse]])
* {{ja-r|鬼%籍|き%せき}}: a [[family]] [[death]] [[register]]; {{qualifier|poetic}} the [[rank]]s of the [[dead]]
* {{ja-r|妓%籍|ぎ%せき}}: a [[registration]] as a [[geisha]]; the [[world]] of the geisha
* {{ja-r|軍%籍|ぐん%せき}}: [[enlistment]]; one's [[rank]] and [[role]] as a [[member]] of the [[military]]
* {{ja-r|経%籍|けい%せき}}: the [[Confucian]] [[classic]]s
* {{ja-r|原%籍|げん%せき}}: one's [[original]] [[family]] [[register]] (such as when [[transfer]]ring)
* {{ja-r|皇%籍|こう%せき}}: [[membership]] in the [[imperial]] [[family]]
* {{ja-r|国%籍|こく%せき}}: [[nationality]], [[citizenship]]
* {{ja-r|戸%籍|こ%せき}}: [[family]] [[register]]
* {{ja-r|載%籍|さい%せき}}: [[write down|writing]] something [[write down|down]]; a [[record]], a [[document]]
* {{ja-r|在%籍|ざい%せき}}: [[current]] [[membership]] or [[enrollment]]; to be [[currently]] [[enrolled]] or a [[member]]
* {{ja-r|裁%判%籍|さい%ばん%せき}}: {{qualifier|law}} the [[forum rei]], the [[jurisdiction]] or [[forum]] of a [[court]]
* {{ja-r|史%籍|し%せき}}: an [[historical]] [[record]], a [[history]] [[book]]
* {{ja-r|重%国%籍|じゅう% こく%せき}}: [[double]] [[citizenship]]
* {{ja-r|就%籍|しゅう%せき}}: {{qualifier|law}} the [[addition]] or [[registration]] to a [[family]] [[register]] of a person who previously had no [[family]] [[register]] (such as when a non-Japanese person [[marries]] or is [[adopt]]ed into a Japanese family)
* {{ja-r|書%籍|しょ%せき}}, {{ja-r|書%籍|しょ%じゃく}}: {{qualifier|somewhat formal}} a [[book]]
* {{ja-r|除%籍|じょ%せき}}, {{ja-r|除%籍|じょ%じゃく}}: [[removal]] from a [[register]]; {{qualifier|historical}} in the {{w|Heian period}}, [[removal]] from the [[register]] of people allowed to enter the [[imperial]] [[residence]]
* {{ja-r|臣%籍|しん%せき}}: {{qualifier|historical}} one's [[status]] as an [[imperial]] [[subject]]
* {{ja-r|図%籍|ず%せき}}, {{ja-r|図%籍|と%せき}}: a [[map]] of a [[country]], showing [[territory]] and [[land]] [[ownership]]; [[picture]]s and [[document]]s, [[book]]s in general
* {{ja-r|籍%籍|せき%せき}}: [[noisy]], [[lively]], [[bustling]]
* {{ja-r|仙%籍|せん%せき}}: a [[register]] [[indicate|indicating]] [[permission]] to enter the [[imperial]] [[residence]]
* {{ja-r|船%籍|せん%せき}}: a [[ship]]'s [[registration]], a ship's [[nationality]]
* {{ja-r|送%籍|そう%せき}}: a [[copy]] of a person's [[family]] [[register]]; {{qualifier|historical}} a [[transfer]] to a different [[family]] [[register]]
* {{ja-r|僧%籍|そう%せき}}: [[membership]] in a [[Buddhist]] [[priesthood]] or [[nunhood]]
* {{ja-r|族%籍|ぞく%せき}}: [[membership]] in a [[family]] or [[clan]]
* {{ja-r|属%籍|ぞく%せき}}: the [[register]] or [[group]] to which one [[belong]]s
* {{ja-r|多%国%籍|た%こく%せき}}: [[multiple]] [[citizenship]]
* {{ja-r|脱%籍|だっ%せき}}: [[removal]] or [[omission]] from a [[family]] [[register]]
* {{ja-r|地%籍|ち%せき}}: [[land]] [[registry]], [[title]], [[deed]]
* {{ja-r|珍%籍|ちん%せき}}: a [[strange]] [[book]]
* {{ja-r|枕%籍|ちん%せき}}: [[multiple]] [[book]]s [[pile]]d together and used as a [[pillow]]; [[bedroom]]
* {{ja-r|通%籍|つう%せき}}: a [[pass]] [[indicate|indicating]] [[permission]] to enter the [[imperial]] [[residence]]
* {{ja-r|典%籍|てん%せき}}, {{ja-r|典%籍|てん%じゃく}}: {{qualifier|somewhat formal}} a [[book]]
* {{ja-r|転%籍|てん%せき}}: a [[transfer]] of one's [[official]] [[residence]] or [[household]]; a [[transfer]] of [[membership]] to a different group
* {{ja-r|田%籍|でん%せき}}, {{ja-r|田%籍|でん%じゃく}}: {{qualifier|historical}} a [[paddy]] [[register]], [[record]]ing family [[land]] [[ownership]] and [[size]]s
* {{ja-r|党%籍|とう%せき}}: [[membership]] in a [[political]] [[party]]
* {{ja-r|二%重%国%籍|に%じゅう% こく%せき}}: [[double]] [[citizenship]]
* {{ja-r|入%籍|にゅう%せき}}: [[entry]] into a [[family]] [[register]] (such as at [[birth]], [[adoption]], or [[marriage]] into a family)
* {{ja-r|版%籍|はん%せき}}: [[territory]] and [[family]] [[register]]s; the [[land]] and the [[people]]
* {{ja-r|藩%籍|はん%せき}}: [[membership]] in a ''[[han]]'' or [[feudal]] [[fiefdom]] as a [[subject]] or [[retainer]]; the [[territory]] and the [[people]] of such a [[fiefdom]]
* {{ja-r|復%籍|ふく%せき}}: to [[return]] one's original [[family]] [[register]] (such as after a [[divorce]] or the [[death]] of a [[spouse]])
* {{ja-r|付%籍|ふ%せき}}: an [[ancillary]] or [[additional]] [[family]] [[register]] [[attach]]ed to another family register
* {{ja-r|分%籍|ぶん%せき}}: a [[new]] [[family]] [[register]] [[split off]] from another family register
* {{ja-r|文%籍|ぶん%せき}}, {{ja-r|文%籍|ぶん%じゃく}}: [[writings]], [[book]]s
* {{ja-r|兵%籍|へい%せき}}: [[enlistment]]; one's [[rank]] and [[role]] as a [[member]] of the [[military]]
* {{ja-r|編%籍|へん%せき}}: the [[creation]] or [[compilation]] of a [[family]] [[register]]
* {{ja-r|本%籍|ほん%せき}}: one's [[main]] or [[original]] [[family]] [[register]]; the [[location]] of one's family register
* {{ja-r|名%籍|みょう%せき}}: a [[register]] of the [[family name]]s [[belong]]ing to a group
* {{ja-r|名%籍|めい%せき}}: a [[register]] of people by [[name]], [[age]], and [[rank]] or [[status]]
* {{ja-r|民%籍|みん%せき}}: {{qualifier|historical}} [[citizenship]]; {{qualifier|historical}} [[membership]] in the [[commoner]] [[class]]
* {{ja-r|無%国%籍|む%こく%せき}}: [[statelessness]], the [[lack]] of any [[citizenship]]
* {{ja-r|無%籍|む%せき}}: the [[lack]] of [[membership]] in any [[family]] [[register]]; [[statelessness]], the [[lack]] of any [[citizenship]]
* {{ja-r|落%籍|らく%せき}}: [[removal]] or [[omission]] from a [[family]] [[register]]; [[marrying]] a [[geisha]] and [[pay]]ing to [[remove]] them from the [[register]] of their [[house]]
* {{ja-r|六%籍|りく%せき}}, {{ja-r|六%籍|ろく%せき}}: the [[six]] [[Confucian]] [[classic]]s; the six pairs of [[yin]] and [[yang]] [[prime]] [[meridian]]s in [[Chinese medicine]]
* {{ja-r|離%籍|り%せき}}: {{qualifier|law}} the [[forcible]] [[removal]] of a person from a [[family]] [[register]]
{{der-bottom}}

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=kanon|せき}}

From {{bor|ja|ltc|sort=せき|-}} {{ltc-l|籍}}.  The [[漢音#Japanese|kan'on]], so likely a later borrowing.  Compare modern {{cog|nan-hok|-}} reading ''che̍k'', {{cog|cdo|-}} ''cĭk''.

subSections.title: Noun
